commits.message:
EUCA-13391 - Cannot ping secondary ENIs after VM migration

Description:
 - secondary network interfaces are not detached from main bridge on instance migration. The
   ccInstance secNetCfgs->stateName is empty causing the information to not be included in
   the request to the node controller.

Changes:
 - CC: Fixed a memcpy() bug where we copy the first secondary netConfig to every network configuration
   for the instance.
 - CC/NC: Changed adb-helper.h to set the stateName to "attached", when unmarshalling the request as
   the presence of the secondary interfaces indicates that they are attached.

Testing:
 - QA regression.
 - nephoria-vpc-eni-basics tests.
 - Instrumented debugging and packet verification.
 - Verified that the secondary interfaces are correctly owned by midonet.
